title: Redesign Home page with professional underwater theme and 3 feature boxes with CTAs

requirements.text: Update the Home page UI to use a professional underwater theme (colors, gradients, typography, and section styling) consistent with the existing ocean-themed design tokens, while keeping the existing top navigation behavior intact.

quotes: in home page i want under water theme which is proffesional .

acceptanceCriteria: Home page background and major sections visually reflect a professional underwater/ocean theme (e.g., deep-ocean gradients, subtle highlights) and do not use the current sky/light-blue gradient styling.
The existing header navigation buttons (Home, Profile, Google Map, Comment, Calculate) still navigate to the same pages as before via the existing onNavigate callback.
No changes are required to backend canister code.

requirements.text: Add a bottom section on the Home page containing 3 boxes side-by-side (responsive) with the exact feature titles, descriptions, and CTA labels provided by the user; each CTA must navigate to the appropriate existing page.

quotes: In this home page at the bottom i need  3 box  side by side . in these box  i need the content which i am going to say below 1. Interactive Map :Search ocean locations and view real time environmental readings including PH,turbidity and oxygen level below this sentence i need Explore Map option.2.Coral Reef Health Index : calculate the health status of coral reefs based on water temperature and PH value. Get  detailed Impacts and recommendations.  below this i need Calculate index option 3.Comment :

acceptanceCriteria: The Home page shows a bottom section with 3 boxed cards in one row on desktop/tablet; on small screens they stack vertically with appropriate spacing.

Box 1 content is exactly: Title: "Interactive Map"; Description: "Search ocean locations and view real time environmental readings including PH,turbidity and oxygen level"; CTA button/option label: "Explore Map"; clicking navigates to the existing map page (onNavigate('map')).

Box 2 content is exactly: Title: "Coral Reef Health Index"; Description: "calculate the health status of coral reefs based on water temperature and PH value. Get  detailed Impacts and recommendations."; CTA button/option label: "Calculate index"; clicking navigates to the existing calculate page (onNavigate('calculate')).

Box 3 exists with Title: "Comment" and includes a CTA that navigates to the existing comment page (onNavigate('comment')). (If no description text is provided by the user, keep description minimal and professional.)
The bottom 3-box section is not obscured by the footer; page content remains accessible without overlapping fixed elements.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text added to the UI.
Frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*) must not be edited.
Do not introduce new backend services or databases; keep changes frontend-only unless strictly necessary.
nonGoals: Adding new map/data functionality beyond linking to the existing GoogleMapPage.
Changing the coral index calculation logic on CalculatePage.
Persisting comments to the backend (CommentPage currently uses local component state).
